label: 後醍醐天皇綸旨
text:
渋谷新平二入道
					
定円
当知行地、不可
					有相違者、
					 天気如此、悉之以状、
					 　　　元弘三年十一月九日　　　　　　　　　式部大丞（花押）





THE land in actual holding of Shibuya
					Shin-hei-zhi nyu-do
Jo-Yen shall not be disturbed. The Imperial
					pleasure is hereby conveyed.
					Gen-ko 3 y. 11 m. 9 d. [16 December 1333].
						Shiki-bu dai-zho,
						(monogram).
To-chi-gyo chi, land in actual
					holding.
This is Shigemoto, the fourth
					lord of the Iriki-in.
One who bore the official title
					dai-zho in the shiki-bu department. He transmits the imperial decree.
xml:
渋谷新平二入道 定円 当知行地、不可 有相違者、 天気如此、悉之以状、 　　　元弘三年十一月九日　　　　　　　　　式部大丞（花押）

THE land in actual holding of Shibuya Shin-hei-zhi nyu-do Jo-Yen shall not be disturbed. The Imperial pleasure is hereby conveyed. Gen-ko 3 y. 11 m. 9 d. [16 December 1333]. Shiki-bu dai-zho, (monogram).

To-chi-gyo chi, land in actual holding. This is Shigemoto, the fourth lord of the Iriki-in. One who bore the official title dai-zho in the shiki-bu department. He transmits the imperial decree.
外題: 御綸旨御下文御感状御教書　九通　九番
